metadata.title: CVE-2024-23226 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin macOS Sonoma 14.4, visionOS 1.1, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, watchOS 10.4,tvOS 17.4. Processing web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
